billEvents.eventText: REFERRED TO COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS

title: Provides that entities eligible to receive economic development subsidies must meet certain criteria to receive such subsidies
summary: Provides that entities eligible to receive economic development subsidies must: pay each employee a minimum wage that's at least one dollar higher than state minimum wage levels; offer health insurance benefit plans to employees employed at least 35 hours per week; and offer at least twenty percent of its workers a worker training program.
currentCommittee: COMMERCE, ECONOMIC DEVELOPMENT AND SMALL BUSINESS
actClause: AN ACT to amend the economic development law, in relation to establishing the "minimum standards for subsidized jobs act"
